articles.title: RVNL, RFCL snap seven-day rally, decline up to 6% - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Among major losers, Indian Railway Finance Corporation Ltd retreated from its 52-week high levels on Wednesday, tanking more than 5.5 percent to hit a day’s low of Rs 67.23 per share on BSE.

articles.author: Meghna Sen
articles.title: Jio Financial Services may be the next largecap inclusion in Jan 2024 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: With the removal of Jio Financial shares from NSE Indices, passive funds tracking those indices will have to adjust their portfolios. The adjustment is scheduled for final 30 minutes of trading on September 6.
